span.strong: Itasca School District is closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Learning continues through remote learning for the remainder of the school year. Please stay safe and healthy, we miss you!

div.p: The District 10 Administration Building is located in downtown Itasca.
Itasca is home to many active community organizations.
Congratulations to our February Board Salutes 2020

Board Salutes American Legion Speech Contest Winners
Congratulations to Bryen Travis for WGN Teacher of the Month

Welcome! Itasca Public School District 10 is a near northwestern suburban community approximately 25 miles from Chicago. It is located in the north east quadrant of DuPage County. It serves the communities of Itasca, Nordic Hills, and a portion of Wood Dale.
